instructions.description: The Save icon is located in the toolbar at the top of the Spyder interface. It is a small icon resembling a floppy disk, positioned between the upload icon and the print icon.
instructions.general_instruction: Click the save icon located in the top right toolbar to save your current work.
instructions.simple_instruction: Begin by positioning your cursor on `Save`.

instruction: Begin by positioning your cursor on 'Save'.

instructions.description: The target element is a small downward arrow located within a dropdown menu under the 'Open Recent' option in the File menu of the Bluefish application. It is positioned to the right of the file path '/Users/agatha/image.png'. This arrow is distinct from other elements in the menu and is used to expand or collapse the list of recent files.
instructions.functional_instruction: Select a recently opened file to quickly access and edit it.
instructions.simple_instruction: Where is the `click` element? Point to it with your mouse.

instruction: Position your cursor above the given UI item: 'click'
